## About me 

<pre >
I am passionate about technology.  
I used to work in a chemical lab making fine fragrance perfumes, body care and homecare. But still my desires with technology always remained present, making games in Unity, exploring Augmented Reality with Spark AR, doing some Java implementation of Android.
Currently I'm focused on developing websites or web applications
</pre>
